roleset.name: produce together with a partner
roleset.note: COPRODUCE-V, COPRDUCTION-N, COPRODUCING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: coproduce-v: both producers
example.text: John Simon, who produced Child ls Father to the Man, coproduced it with me and wrote some great arrangements.
example.arg: John Simon, who produced Child ls Father to the Man,

example.name: coproduction-n
example.text: The ultimate effect was their coproduction of a shared vision of community
example.arg: of a shared vision of community
